# .github/workflows/nightly-release.yml
name: Nightly Release

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 3 * * *'  # 3 AM UTC every day
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build:
    strategy:
      matrix:
        include:
          - os: windows-latest
            submodule: hiwave-windows
            artifact: hiwave.exe
            archive: hiwave-windows-nightly.zip
          - os: macos-latest
            submodule: hiwave-macos
            artifact: hiwave
            archive: hiwave-macos-nightly.zip
    
    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          submodules: recursive
          fetch-depth: 0
      
      - name: Install Rust
        uses: dtolnay/rust-action@stable
      
      - name: Build
        working-directory: ${{ matrix.submodule }}
        run: cargo build --release
      
      - name: Package (Windows)
        if: matrix.os == 'windows-latest'
        shell: pwsh
        run: |
          Compress-Archive -Path "${{ matrix.submodule }}/target/release/${{ matrix.artifact }}" -DestinationPath "${{ matrix.archive }}"
      
      - name: Package (macOS/Linux)
        if: matrix.os != 'windows-latest'
        run: |
          zip -j ${{ matrix.archive }} ${{ matrix.submodule }}/target/release/${{ matrix.artifact }}
      
      - name: Upload artifact
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: ${{ matrix.archive }}
          path: ${{ matrix.archive }}

  release:
    needs: build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          submodules: recursive
          fetch-depth: 0
      
      - name: Check for changes since last nightly
        id: changes
        run: |
          LAST_NIGHTLY=$(git tag -l 'nightly-*' --sort=-v:refname | head -n1)
          if [ -z "$LAST_NIGHTLY" ]; then
            echo "has_changes=true" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
          else
            CHANGES=$(git log ${LAST_NIGHTLY}..HEAD --oneline)
            if [ -n "$CHANGES" ]; then
              echo "has_changes=true" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
            else
              echo "has_changes=false" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
            fi
          fi
      
      - name: Download all artifacts
        if: steps.changes.outputs.has_changes == 'true'
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          path: dist
          merge-multiple: true
      
      - name: Delete previous nightly release
        if: steps.changes.outputs.has_changes == 'true'
        run: |
          gh release delete nightly --yes || true
          git push --delete origin nightly || true
        env:
          GH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
      
      - name: Create Nightly Release
        if: steps.changes.outputs.has_changes == 'true'
        uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v1
        with:
          tag_name: nightly
          name: "Nightly Build ($(date +'%Y-%m-%d'))"
          body: |
            ⚠️ **This is an automated nightly build. It may be unstable.**
            
            Built from commit: ${{ github.sha }}
            
            For stable releases, use the [latest weekly build](https://github.com/${{ github.repository }}/releases/latest).
          prerelease: true
          files: |
            dist/*
